member.summary: Writes a new sentence with the statistics service.

member.summary: Determines was a sentence with a given subject, verb and object ever written.
member.param: Defines the subject of the sentence.
Defines the verb of the sentence.
Defines the object of the sentence.
member.returns: True if specified sentence was written at least once; otherwise false.
